name: Eternal
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the eternal has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The eternal makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

actions.name: Life Drain
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under the eternal's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The eternal can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
